flawed_nl_solution:
Susan spent 600/2=<<600/2=30>>30 on clothes
After buying clothes she had 600-30= <<600-30=570>>570 dollars left
She spent 570/2=<<570/2=285>>285 dollars on books
She had 570-285=<<570-285=285>>285 dollars left
#### 285

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
